creator: m.duerrenberger@gmx.net
text:
I needed to configure tomcat for ssl-client authentication. 
There is a table describing the attributes for connectors using ssl.
(http://tomcat.apache.org/tomcat-6.0-doc/ssl-howto.html) under 'Edit the Tomcat Configuration File'
In this table the 'crlFile' - attribute for the revocation list(s) is missing.

greez and tnx 
martin

creator: markt@apache.org
text: Thanks for the report. This has been fixed in trunk and 6.0.x and will be included in 6.0.21 onwards.
